items.content_html: This is a lightweight, easy-to-use module for Deno that streamlines the creation and management of web, file, and WebSocket servers. Leveraging Deno's built-in serve function, this module simplifies the process of setting up servers, making it accessible even to beginners, while providing enough flexibility for more advanced users.
items.title: jonasfrey/websersocket: This is a lightweight, easy-to-use module for Deno that streamlines the creation and management of web, file, and WebSocket servers. Leveraging Deno's built-in serve function, this module simplifies the process of setting up servers, making it accessible even to beginners, while providing enough flexibility for more advanced users.
